subject: Re: [junit] When can you NOT use Mock objects?
msgSnippet: Nope. Mock Objects can be used to write any test in the world. I don t see a situation in which Mock Objects cannot be used. I can see situations in which Mock
messageBody:
Nope. Mock Objects can be used to write any test in the world. I don't
see a situation in which Mock Objects cannot be used. I can see
situations in which Mock Objects are not needed, but not a situation
where one would think one needs a mock object, but a mock object does
no good.

So said tobemligado <jasbell@...> on 2003-01-26
--------------------

>Can someone explain a coding situation where a Mock object can not be
>used to solve a test case
>
>
